name: Roll4it
description:
Roll4it

Revived an old project of mine, which i did at the first uni semester in ansii c. Now written in C#, mostly from the ground, beacuse the old code was a bit .... messy.

Roll4it is a little text-based luck game, about dices and rng. A lot of rng. Take your choices, collect points and trickpoints and win the game with your cunning.

Play versus the inner AI, or challange your friends up-to a 4 player local match.

Made for: Game Dev Network - Apple Jam

Theme: Text-based

Discord: Achie72

Game Dev Network Discord: https://discord.gg/ApvAcpR

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Achie7240
